name: TheoryTalk
body:
This is a weekly series of informal talks given by people enthusiastic about Theoretical Computer Science. The goal is to have an interactive session discussing _relevant_ papers. The speaker should consider the background of the audience and spend ample time in laying the basics of the paper before going on to the knitty-gritties. Also note this is _not_ a platform to prove one's smartness but mutually learn something new.

# Week 1
## Abhiruk Lahiri
### TBA
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
